tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PesticideUsage (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   pesticide_name VARCHAR(100),
   application_date DATE,
   application_area FLOAT,
   impact_assessment VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE PesticideUsage (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pesticide_name VARCHAR(50),
  application_date DATE,
  application_area DECIMAL(10, 2),
  environmental_impact VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE AgriculturalAreas (
  area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  area_name VARCHAR(50),
  total_acres DECIMAL(10, 2),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  soil_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Pesticide_Usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pesticide_name VARCHAR(255),
    usage_date DATE,
    quantity_used DECIMAL(10, 2),
    area_covered DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Pesticide_Impact (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pesticide_id INT,
    impact_type VARCHAR(255),
    impact_description TEXT,
    impact_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Agricultural_Areas (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name VARCHAR(255),
    location_coordinates GEOGRAPHY,
    soil_type VARCHAR(100),
    crop_type VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE pesticide_inventory (
    pesticide_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pesticide_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE application_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pesticide_id INT,
    application_date DATE,
    application_area FLOAT,
    application_method VARCHAR(255),
    application_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    impact_type VARCHAR(255),
    impact_description TEXT,
    impact_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE field_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    crop_type VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE pesticides (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    usage_area VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    toxicity_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE agricultural_areas (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    size_acres DECIMAL(10,2),
    soil_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE pesticide_applications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pesticide_id INT NOT NULL,
    area_id INT NOT NULL,
    application_date DATE,
    application_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    CONSTRAINT fk_pesticide FOREIGN KEY (pesticide_id) REFERENCES pesticides(id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_area FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES agricultural_areas(id)
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    application_id INT NOT NULL,
    impact_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    impact_description TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_application FOREIGN KEY (application_id) REFERENCES pesticide_applications(id)
);

CREATE TABLE assessment_reports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    report_text TEXT,
    impact_id INT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_impact FOREIGN KEY (impact_id) REFERENCES environmental_impact(id)
);
